ctx: intros a b H1 H2 H3.
exceptions.tactic: destruct (Zdivide_Zdiv_lt_pos b a Hb H1 Hpr) as [Hd1 Hd2].
exceptions.exn: In environment a, b : Z H1 : 1 < b H2 : b < a H3 : forall c : Z, b < c < a -> rel_prime c a Hb : 0 < b Ha : 0 < a Hpr : prime a The term "Hb" has type "0 < b" while it is expected to have type "1 < b".

ctx: intros a b H1 H2 H3.

exceptions.exn: In environment a, b : Z H1 : 1 < b H2 : b < a H3 : forall c : Z, b < c < a -> rel_prime c a Hb : 0 < b Ha : 0 >= a Unable to unify "Zis_gcd ?M1861 ?M1863 1" with "prime a".

ctx: intros a b H1 H2 H3.
exceptions.tactic: destruct (Zdivide_Zdiv_lt_pos a b Ha H2 Hpr) as [Hd1 Hd2].
exceptions.exn: In environment a, b : Z H1 : 1 < b H2 : b < a H3 : forall c : Z, b < c < a -> rel_prime c a Hb : 0 >= b Ha : 0 >= a Hpr : prime a The term "Ha" has type "0 >= a" while it is expected to have type "1 < a".

original: intros a b H1 H2 H3. destruct (Z_lt_ge_dec 0 b) as [Hb|Hb], (Z_lt_ge_dec 0 a) as [Ha|Ha]. - right. intro Hpr. destruct (Zdivide_Zdiv_lt_pos b a Hb H1 Hpr) as [Hd1 Hd2]. destruct (prime_divisors b Hb a Hd2) as [Hd3|Hd3]; lia. - left. apply prime_rel_prime. apply prime_intro; lia. - right. intro Hpr. destruct (prime_divisors a Ha b H3 Hpr) as [Hd1|Hd1]; destruct Hd1; subst; lia. - right. intro Hpr. destruct (Zdivide_Zdiv_lt_pos a b Ha H2 Hpr) as [Hd1 Hd2]. destruct (prime_divisors a Ha b Hd2) as [Hd3|Hd3]; lia.
